content: This app is really fun and challenging but sometimes on easy they put really hard ones
Great and simple app to improve and strengthen one's math skills. After using the free version for sometime I now upgraded to Pro out of principles to the work of it's developers.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review and support, we highly appreciate that!

content: Good Math workout app. It is very easy and good for practice.
replyContent: Thank you for your review. We are glad you liked it!

content: Very nice, needs a few extra settings as mentioned in my feedback.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and suggestions!

content: Good app. "Lazy mode" number pad layout would benefit from having "clear" button in the bottom right corner rather than empty spot.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and suggestion. We have already fixed it in our latest release, please check it out!
Glad you like it. Thank you for your review
We are pleased that you like our app. Thank you for your review

content: A great way to brush up on your math skills, for no one is never too old to re learn new math.
replyContent: We are pleased that you enjoyed the app. Thank you so much for your review

content: Best math training I have found so far. I could be happier only if there is simpler setting of level of difficulty. I would place it directly on the page with training selection. But anyway, it is very good application and I recommend it.
replyContent: We are glad you like our app. Thank you for your review and suggestion we will consider your feedback
Awesome! Thank you for your review

content: Upgraded to the pro version, definitely worth the small expense to remove the ads and stay focused 100% on improving my mental maths, I think leaderboards for each country and a worldwide leaderboard to measure our progress and for healthy competition would be great editions to the app. Maybe even organised competitions directly between users in the various difficulties later on.
replyContent: Glad that you like it. Thank you for your review and suggestions, we will think about adding such functionality

content: Very nice app for casual math training. The keyboard needs fixing though, the layout of the numbers is not logical and makes it easy to mistype. Please add an few different keyboard layout with option to choose :)
replyContent: Thank you for your review and suggestions, we are going to include that in our upcoming versions

content: Accidentally deleted my last review.. When you're in any mode, sometimes your keypresses aren't recognised for 1-3 taps. Again this is on a 2019 Asus ZenFone 6.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, we have fixed the keypad issue in our latest release, it's now faster. Please check it out!
